title: Set Target ROAS
description: Schema for setting or updating target ROAS bidding strategy

account_id.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no dashes)

campaign_resource_name.description: Full campaign resource name (alternative to campaign_id)

target_roas.description: Target Return on Ad Spend (e.g., 2.5 means 250% ROAS, 3.0 means 300% ROAS)

cpc_bid_ceiling_micros.description: Optional maximum CPC bid limit in micros

cpc_bid_floor_micros.description: Optional minimum CPC bid limit in micros
